content: sometimes we all need a quick mindless project that provides instant gratification i was having one of those days recently since i hadn t finished a wip in a while and the idea to create a crochet version of one of my top-selling patterns the knit moebius headband 1 came to mind so i put on a horror movie it was october after all sat down and got to work less than an hour later this cute turban-style headband was complete and i was in love this design is destined to become your new favorite thing to make as its small size and lightning-fast completion time make it perfect for crocheting on-the-go not to mention absolutely addicting to make it s great for using up single skeins or even partial ones that you have laying around in addition this pattern is so simple that even the newest of beginners should be able to complete this project with ease it features a simple stitch with a beautiful texture and spoiler alert there s a twist at the end as much fun as it is to work up wearing it is just as enjoyable you ll love wearing your new crochet mobius headband to the park the pumpkin patch or your next coffee run the pattern instructions create a headband that should fit most adults and i ve also included some tips for adjusting the pattern to fit any size you could hope for to make the crochet moebius headband you will need * 65 yds of bulky 5 yarn or __ yards of dk or light 3 yarn * us size m 9mm crochet hook * yarn needle * scissors you are more than welcome to sell anything you make using this pattern i just ask that you credit me as the designer and include
